title: Hieu Sinh Vegetarian Restaurant
description: A 100% vegan restaurant opened July 2015. Serves only fresh foods (no faux meats). Try the asparagus and eggplant cooked in a  casserole pot. Other menu items are a plate of steamed fresh veggies (broccoli, mushrooms, carrots, cauliflower) and a plate of vermicelli noodles with mushrooms. Smoothies are made-to-order.
